pullrequest.title: User scaling commands are properly logged and played back

content.raw:
I think the test is not as much of a problem as the solution is. I briefly talked about this with @iche033 and I think we haven't got to a conclusion about what the ideal behaviour would be.

The main problem is that under certain circumstances, changing the scale is actually changing the geometry.
